testsuite.name: jdk7::config::alternatives CentOS with all the defaults on operatingsystem Redhat

testcase.name: jdk7::config::alternatives CentOS with all the defaults on operatingsystem Redhat should contain Exec[java alternatives java] with command => "alternatives --install /usr/bin/java java /usr/java/jdk1.7.0_51/bin/java 18000", unless => "alternatives --display java | /bin/grep jdk1.7.0_51 | /bin/grep 'priority 18000$'" and user => "root"
